description:
Matakara`s violence is unstoppable after merging with Ichiya and defeating Marito. He demands that Kenichiro fight him one-on-one. Meanwhile, Mahoro waits anxiously for Marito to regain consciousness and Senya finally explains his true goals to Arajin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des sentiments incompris ! Un plat de riz au crabe inopiné
Todokanu Omoi! Kani Chaahan wa Totsuzen ni
Unanswered Wishes! Sudden Crab Fried Rice
とどかぬ想い! カニチャーハンは突然に
